                                                    java.util.List<java.lang.String> ExpectedKey,
                                                    java.lang.String strExpectedVal)
                                             throws org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
        Compares an attribute value in the response and the actual expected value.
        Parameters:
        strReqJSON - [String] : Request JSON
        ExpectedKey - [List of String] : Complete path of the attribute under consideration *
        strExpectedVal - [String] : Expected value of the attribute
        Returns:
        [Boolean] True if expected and actual values of the attribute match.
        Throws:
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - : Unparseable document
